comment.author: 허현옥
comment.content: If you think you are pretty much done, I will copy your Model project to Coska_MySchool project. I am still struggling with Action and Manager classes but, I think I can start combine Model and Manager classes at this weekend. If I have a problem with Model, I will let you know. Thank you for you all the hard works.

post.content:
CourseType is implemented as a class and integrated with Course.
A JUnit for it has been created and tested.

I think I am pretty much done with the model now.
Will go back and keep relevant documents up to date.

Let me know if there is anything that is not working during UI integration.

Thanks.
post.title: CourseType completed
